title: Raging duo partner
body:
Have you ever gone duo with a rager? 

Had a request for a duo last night who got caught by  easily avoidable ganks then raged at team when they said (very politely ) to keep an eye on minimap and then went afk but stayed on to abuse us.  I mean what the fuck.  Solo q i can understand but feeding and then abusing the duo partner? That is pretty special.

replies.body:
I mean I've called people meany bo peeny turd poopoo heads in yolo q before but surely if you ASK to duo with someone there would be a spirit of collegial cooperation there which might hold one back from telling the person you asked to duo that you had intimate relations with their mother and that you want to fite irl.

Just makes no sense to me.
Happens to a lot of people apparently.
welcome to OCE , home of noobs,ragers,abusers,afkers, etc etc
